original_text: With this in mind, since I myself have carefully investigated everything from the beginning, I too decided to write an orderly account for you, most excellent Theophilus,
korean_text: 그 모든 일을 근원부터 자세히 미루어 살핀 나도 데오빌로 각하에게 차례대로 써 보내는 것이 좋은 줄 알았노니

sentences.original_text: since I myself have carefully investigated everything
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 직접 모든 것을 신중히 조사했으므로

sentences.original_text: I too decided to write an orderly account
